finder-method.name: findByEmployeeProjectAndPeriod
finder-method.filter: (self.assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND self.assignedTo.employee IS NOT NULL AND self.assignedTo.employee = :employee) AND (self.project IS NOT NULL AND self.project = :project) AND ((self.taskDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate) OR (self.taskEndDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate))

finder-method.name: findByEmployeeAndPeriod
finder-method.filter: (self.assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND self.assignedTo.employee IS NOT NULL AND self.assignedTo.employee = :employee) AND ((self.taskDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate) OR (self.taskEndDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate))

finder-method.name: findByProjectAndPeriod
finder-method.filter: (self.project IS NOT NULL AND self.project = :project) AND ((self.taskDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate) OR (self.taskEndDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate))
